column4: for some reason i cant configure my second nic to connect straight to my modem. i have a straight through cable going to eth1. i have eth1 configed as ip: 192.168.1.11, netmask 255.255.255.0, gateway 255.255.255.0 and DNS as 68.87.29.164 (comcast) whe ni try to ping the dns it says its unreachable
im trying to get rid of my router
